LanguageData.NodResearch.label: NOD
LanguageData.NodResearch.description: Join the Brotherhood of Nod. And become the enemy of the GDI.
LanguageData.NodResearch_Buildings.label: Nod Structures
LanguageData.NodResearch_Buildings.description: Get access to Nod structures. Unlocks the construction of basic structures and production facilities.
LanguageData.NodResearch_Technology.label: Brotherhood Secrets
LanguageData.NodResearch_Technology.description: Get access to basic Nod technology. Necessary for further research.
LanguageData.NodResearch_AdvancedTechnology.label: Brotherhood's Enlightment
LanguageData.NodResearch_AdvancedTechnology.descripti: Get access to advanced Nod technology. Necessary for advanced research.
LanguageData.NodResearch_LiquidTechnology.label: Liquid Ichor
LanguageData.NodResearch_LiquidTechnology.description: Nod's efforts have proven well, it is finally possible to liquify Tiberium and harness it's true power. Use it wisely commander. Unlocks Liquid Tiberium items.
LanguageData.NodResearch_Security.label: Defensive Structures
LanguageData.NodResearch_Security.description: Get access to basic Nod security structures. Unlocks the Shredder Turret.
LanguageData.NodResearch_Production.label: Brotherhood Assembly I
LanguageData.NodResearch_Production.description: Start conquering the world. Unlocks the production of small firearms and armor.
LanguageData.NodResearch_AdvancedSecurity.label: Advanced Defense
LanguageData.NodResearch_AdvancedSecurity.description: Get access to advanced Nod security structures. Unlocks the Obelisk of Light.
LanguageData.NodResearch_AdvancedProduction.label: Brotherhood Assembly II
LanguageData.NodResearch_AdvancedProduction.descripti: Cleanse this world from heretics. Unlocks the Black Hand armor, Flamethrower and advanced laser rifle.
